website_summaries.verdict: Leave your home feeling secure with this simple yet effective alarm.
pros: Device is easy to use: simply pull the top off to sound the alarm, and put it back on to stop it
Loud, clear sound provides a sense of security when walking alone
Available in multiple colors, the small, sleek design will not look out of place on your bag
Volume is comparable to a car alarm
cons: The battery can't be replaced or recharged, but it should last a long time

customer_reviews.title: Beware, battery cannot be replaced.  This should be at the top of the listing so buyers are aware.
customer_reviews.text: Be very aware here that it is not in the main listing but cannot replace the batteries so if using for storage for future the batteries will just die and they are a paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Recommend getting a bigger one
customer_reviews.text: Small, sleak and it works. And I suppose it would be very loud if you put to your ear, but not truly loud enough to make a difference, say in a crowded party. Probably too small for that kind of noise. Recommend getting a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: I find myself getting home late from work and I love the sense of security I get from walking through ...
customer_reviews.text: Since I received my iMaxAlarm I have not left home without it! I find myself getting home late from work and I love the sense of security I get from walking through the streets at night. My favorite thing about this alarm is that it came with a lanyard that you can wear around your neck. I love going hiking and having my iMax Alarm hanging from neck really gives me the confidence to go off trail! The Alarm is so loud that anyone will be able to hear me if I get lost! It's also more discreet and convenient that pepper spray. I am getting my mom and sisters all one. They make great gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Rosie Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Keep scary people away!
customer_reviews.text: Loud for the size. Light weight. Product as expected. "Black is best" - the black version has a slight rubberized coating which gives it a higher quality feel and helps when gripping to remove the tab to activate the alarm sound. Would consider buying more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Y Z

customer_reviews.title: Not at all loud enough.  Worthless.
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is not loud at all. An attacker would laugh at you if you set this off. I plan to return it.
customer_reviews.author: SBAZ

customer_reviews.title: This will really get your co - workers attention :(
customer_reviews.text: Was really happy with it until recently. I take the train to/from work and often have to work after dark. I enjoyed the security I had knowing this was on my backpack. Now, as of yesterday, it has gone off 3x, very unexpectedly- not to mention scaring me and my coworkers. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cah925

customer_reviews.title: The matte finish of this product also feels great. My only problem is that the plug is ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound that is expelled from this little device definitely will scare off predators. The matte finish of this product also feels great. My only problem is that the plug is a little flimsy. I dropped the device once (maybe only 2.5 ft off the ground) and the plug came off, releasing the blaring sound. As a precaution, I carry this item in my pocket by itself to prevent any unwanted pulling.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Yeung

customer_reviews.title: Nice, compact
customer_reviews.text: Nice, compact, and loud, but needs to have a hook, or I or some sort of attachment on both sections so that it can be used as a door alarm as well as a personal alarm. I use them on my motorcycle so that if anyone moves it, it sets off the alarm. I glued a piece of Velcro to the fob end to hold it in place. .
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: Quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Looks simple, fashionable, and solid. We tried it out. It made a loud noise. We had on ear phones to block some of the sound, so it wasn't deafening to us. Probably a lot louder without the earphones. I like the solid look of it. Not plastic and especially liked the carbiner and the lanyard to go with it. They are quality items also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper and better- looking than other alarms.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister as she is starting her first semester of college. I wanted to get her one of these keychain alarms (along with pepper spray, but that's for another review), but I hated how every other one looked. Every other one has an obnoxious Easter egg look to them that looks hideous. This is a very easy- to- use product. You put it on your key chain, pull the whole thing off of the D- ring part, and then put it back when you need to. Also, the sound is very loud and audible. I am glad that I bought this for her. She is too, but I'm the one writing the review here.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Mai

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality
customer_reviews.text: This device definitely makes me feel safer. The alarm is easy to activate and packs a punch when it comes to the sound it emits! I was impressed by the quality. When I tested it out, my ear drums were pounding. There is no way anyone in the same area could not hear this thing go off. I think it might actually be louder than my car alarm lol! I purchased the black version. The black finish is very grippable, which made it easier to detach the pin for activation. The alarm comes with a lanyard and a carabiner - so you can wear it or attach it to your purse or keys.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Grace

customer_reviews.title: Started Chirping Non Stop
customer_reviews.text: Kept this hanging in the kitchen since purchasing. Today suddenly this thing started chirping where it was making the dog bark nonstop. All the while I’m trying to reach the company for assistance . Unsuccessful at reaching the company IMaxAlarm . Finally busted it with a hammer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery is not replaceable or rechargeable
customer_reviews.text: I have these alarms since March of 2018. I had it in a pocketbook. We started hearing "chirping noises" in our bedroom and at first thought we had a cricket or some other living creature. We could not find where the noise was coming from. after days of trying to figure it out, I moved the pocketbook and it chirped at me. I assume the chirping means the battery is dying. It is really annoying. What is even more annoying is I spend over $22 dollars on 2 alarms that could only be functional for two years. It does say it in the questions section, but the non-replaceable battery statement should have been made clear up front.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Tello

customer_reviews.title: Very Loud
customer_reviews.text: It's very loud. If the purpose is to scare the "attacker" away, it'll do that. But it just sounds like a car alarm & most people wouldn't move off of the couch if they heard a car alarm. Someone needs to create one that says something to the effect of, "Help! Call the Police" and "Help! I'm in danger!". That'll really stop an attacker if they think the police is being called. Also, the pin is very hard to pull. If you're being attacked, I don't see how you can fight off an attacker & pull the pin at the same time unless it's hanging around your neck in which a lanyard was included.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I just received my iMaxAlarm and it's awesome! I have been looking for a good alternative ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received my iMaxAlarm and it's awesome! I have been looking for a good alternative to carrying pepper spray, and this is it! It's now attached to my purse and with me wherever I go.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be used as a trip wire alarm as is
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not looking closely at this unit before purchasing, and I've purchased similar items in the past. But this one does not have an attachment loop anywhere on the main body of the device. That means you cannot secure it to two surfaces (like a zipper and a handbag and use it to trigger when pulled apart. This is not a luggage alarm. You have to manually pull it apart for it to do its job. To me, that's a blind design flaw because a simple hole or loop on the main body would make this a true full featured personal alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: LOUD!! My ears are ringing!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 as Xmas gifts. Tested both out to make sure the batteries worked. Let's just say my ears were ringing for a bit!! WHOA!! I was worried that the top would come undone too easily, causing false, unnecessary SUPER LOUD alarms, but it requires a good tug so I am not worried about it accidentally being pulled out. Good lil safety measure to have on hand while walking to the car late at night and for a child walking to school-the reasons for my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TheFCC

customer_reviews.title: I bought seven originally. This was a replacement for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought seven originally. This was a replacement for one. The one that did not work when needed was for my mother-in-law. She fell outside and could not get up. She pulled it but it did not work. As you would know it, hers was the only one not tested after purchase. Got this one to replace hers and tested it upon arrival, it works. She wears it when ever going outside.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bean

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another personal alarm for my keychain. The plug continuously fell out. This one requires actually removing the plug. Not as loud as expected but the idea is to call attention and hope that the person runs away.
customer_reviews.author: honorvhr

customer_reviews.title: RANDOMLY ALARMS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to stop it,there's not even a strand of hair in the opening.the key is still on and it just randomly alarms.how can i disable that?so disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: yerie

customer_reviews.title: Just ok, not very loud though.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were louder. It’s just annoying, I didn’t have to cover my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Although higher decibels than I have purchased in the past ...
customer_reviews.text: Although higher decibels than I have purchased in the past, sound does not seem as loud or screeching for help. Bystander may not be alarmed by sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen F. Bethards

customer_reviews.title: Very LOUD! Not like cheap plastic toy.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Tested the alarm outdoors and it is LOUD! It startled me and I almost threw the thing out of my car window. This would be perfect for gifts. Considering getting every single female I know one. Would love if the seller has an option to buy in bulk/wholesale and get a bit of a discount. Have not tested the alarm yet. But so far the alarm and material seems well made. Not like cheap plastic toy.
customer_reviews.author: Cleph

customer_reviews.title: My daughter just started working nights
customer_reviews.text: I feel so much safer with her having one of these. Our daughter is a senior in high school and she cleans up a restaurant after closing. I was concerned about not being there. My wife reminded me that other employees lived nearby the restaurant and could hear this if she had to use it. Thanks for bringing some comfort in a crazy world!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Do not test inside without hearing protection!
customer_reviews.text: This will hurt the ears of the attacker - and you! But at least you'll be expecting it. I imagine slapping this on the attacker's ear could be actually debilitating, for a bit. Or toss it a ways off, nobody's going to crush this thing in a hurry, and people will be sticking their heads out for a half-mile around.
customer_reviews.author: Trelligan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, this thing didn't work. Ordered three and only two worked. Thank goodness we tested it before needing it.
customer_reviews.author: Memphis GG

customer_reviews.title: This gizmo will bust an eardrum and that's exactly what ...
customer_reviews.text: This gizmo will bust an eardrum and that's exactly what it should do! everyone should have one of these ... it really is worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Ronald M. Glick

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This little lady packs a punch- We tested it outside and it was loud, which is what it was purchased for. This one is 130 dB were some of them are 120dB so is as loud as it can be. I got this to go with me on my walks, one more added layer of security. Nice simple design which is appreciated. Not sure if there is a battery in this, we shall see, if so not sure how this would be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately i have not needed to use this in an emergency situation BUT impressed with the Sound.
customer_reviews.text: Solid easy to use product with Loud Piercing Sound. Bought this before going on a trip to a big city. Never had to use it. I now keep it clipped to outside of my purse for easy access. Fyi- The button does not press. To sound alarm, you yank & pull the body from the loop. Alarm continues to sound until pin is replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Heather  R. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Just plain no
customer_reviews.text: I tested it as someone walked by on talking on their cell phone. The guy didn't flinch or look up as the alarm went off. It was definitely not 130 decibels.
customer_reviews.author: Chinese Chick

customer_reviews.title: Female Choice.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered five different brands and my wife likes those the best. Color, size, and ease of use along with a free lanyard
customer_reviews.author: hawaiiannovice

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT UNARMED PROTECTION!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Works right out of the box, and last at least a year. Comes with lanyard and clip hook. Only thing is this note I sent to the seller: Truly brilliant product. One note though: I received this package with a brand sticker on the out side. Upon opening I found another brand sticker assisting the tape that held the bubble wrap together. My note is, in the future maybe send a sticker that’s still on it’s backing for promo use. I would’ve love to put that sticker on my car. But great product all in all. Thanks for reading my feedback. Cheers:) -RoyDL3
customer_reviews.author: RoyDL3

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to pull the pin 📌 😕
customer_reviews.text: I asked my husband to pull the pin and he struggled with it,but opted to keep it for himself. I could not pull the pin. Lightweight,loud,and small as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold D.

customer_reviews.title: The lanyard and carabiner included in the box are a very nice touch. Other than personal alarm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this alarm for my wife. The product arrived quickly. The iMAxAlarm feels light but solid. The lanyard and carabiner included in the box are a very nice touch. Other than personal alarm, I can think of many other potential uses for this product...perhaps as a jerry-rigged door alarm with zip ties in a hotel room when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kenbeex

customer_reviews.title: If you park in a parking garage or have to ...
customer_reviews.text: If you park in a parking garage or have to walk by yourself get this device. You just put it around your neck and have the peace of mind that if something happens you can pull it and the alarm will sound.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Pavone

customer_reviews.title: easy to clip on you and pull off when needed ...
customer_reviews.text: easy to clip on you and pull off when needed but NOT loud enough, especially when the round megaphone on the side is muffled by your hand, clothes or the ground. hoping that the Eposgear Minder i ordered is better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be safe!!
customer_reviews.text: I won’t leave any detailed review, because i haven’t use, thankfully not yet. And hopefully never.. 😞. Its easy to attach to my purse and an echo bag handle straps. And when is the right time, its easy to reach out then pull to activate.
customer_reviews.author: kokolooa

customer_reviews.title: a true safety item
customer_reviews.text: hope to never need this; but it seems like it would deter ANYONE and ANYTHING, if I pulled the string if in danger...
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I should not have bought it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet. My daughter said that sometimes an alarm like this would anger an attacker and make things worse.
customer_reviews.author: Adeline P. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Four men started to rob my Daughter in a parking garage and she pulled this off her purse. They ran like crazy! I Purchased another for her, her Mother and Sister. Well worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry H. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: SO LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: This is so loud! The tab is hard to pull accidentally and the sound will absolutely scare somebody off. I feel much safer with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Irons

customer_reviews.title: well made - a must have
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made and very loud. To activate, you pull it apart. The tension needed ensures it won't accidentally get pulled off. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: CyclingRunner

customer_reviews.title: Safety first!!
customer_reviews.text: Night time runner, and this is a great small size for my hands. Comes with a strap that I tie around my wrist. It’s very loud and would provide the safety you need
customer_reviews.author: Lil' Bit

customer_reviews.title: Could be louder
customer_reviews.text: Honestly without getting too into it just to wrap it up as simple as this there are louder and with more features out there... Cheaper too
customer_reviews.author: Ruthless Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to pull, not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: I was quite disappointed in this. It was not easy at all to pull to activate the alarm and it wasn't loud enough, either. Maybe I got a faulty one?
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jesse

customer_reviews.title: For my 86 yr old mom
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom, and fortunately she hasn't had to use it. I am giving it 5 stars from reading the reviews. Peace of mind is everything.
customer_reviews.author: GlamMa

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Nice and loud. A little hard to pull for my 10 year old but I'm glad it doesn't pop off easily too. With a little practice she can do it now.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kujawa

customer_reviews.title: Garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! I received this today and it made no noise at all when I pulled the pin. I slammed it on the counter, still nothing. I wiggled the pin a bit and it went off but after trying a second time... You guessed it; nothing. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feeling a little more secure having this little guy around.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: For the wife
customer_reviews.text: its loud but I really think it should be more I think it will get people's attention, that's what counts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Safety
customer_reviews.text: High-quality, and very discrete product. WARNING: it is LOUD. I am loving this device to far, and I think my clunky, pink pepper spray keychain can officially be retired!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Great for safety when outdoors
customer_reviews.text: This product is light, loud, and has a nice lanyard. Great for when outdoors and concerned about safety. I would buy this again or buy as a gift for others!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Mulherin

customer_reviews.title: Kept making noises. Wish it worked better
customer_reviews.text: IMAX alarm SOS Kept making noises. Wish it worked better.
customer_reviews.author: PH, LLC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loud but be careful where you put it, it comes apart very easily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY LOUD....will work for discreet alarming things
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for what I want to use them for.....tamper alarms.
customer_reviews.author: S. Stiegel

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh is this thing loud. It surprised ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh is this thing loud. It surprised me when I pulled it out to test the sound. It would definitely be heard not a decent ways away. I would buy another
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok , but not as loud as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Not near as loud as I hoped but would PROBABLY cause a curious bystander to investigate.
customer_reviews.author: kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Alarm is very loud and quality is great. Love that it has a carabiner so that I can wear it around my arm or neck.
customer_reviews.author: Boobsie

customer_reviews.title: A must for anyone
customer_reviews.text: Every woman should have one of these for the if. Lightweight easy-to-use with ear piercing noise
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to pull out which concerns me in a time of need, but loud.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia I. Roscigno

customer_reviews.title: Small, discrete but loud alarm
customer_reviews.text: This security alarm is small and discrete but makes a really loud noise when triggered. I will keep this on my backpack since you never know when you will run into bad situations.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lu

customer_reviews.title: Great Alarm!
customer_reviews.text: This personal safety alarm has a loud decibel but does not pierce my eardrums! It is really cute, as an added plus!! Thanks so much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmella L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: It works well, but we returned because we wanted ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but we returned because we wanted for my mom, who is 87, and she is not strong enough to pull the little thing and make it work. It does not work for elderly, unless they are very strong
customer_reviews.author: Josue

customer_reviews.title: Please read
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty loud. But I was hoping my downstairs neighbor would be able to hear it. They could not.
customer_reviews.author: sandra bloch

customer_reviews.title: I really like this iMax Alarm
customer_reviews.text: I really like this iMax Alarm, love the color the and most of all how loud it is when you have to pull the pin. I'm telling all my female friends about it. It makes you feel safer when you're out alone.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie C Serafini

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Cary
customer_reviews.text: Decent size. Can be worn around your neck. Not the loudest but it should serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer Answers Questions

customer_reviews.title: Really loud.
customer_reviews.text: Really loud. Bought these for my daughters to keep in their backpacks. Just in case.
customer_reviews.author: junebug624

customer_reviews.title: ... to wear the alarm around my neck makes for easy and ready access
customer_reviews.text: Being able to wear the alarm around my neck makes for easy and ready access. Size and shape are compact.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really loud and hangs perfectly on the outside of my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Clerk

customer_reviews.title: but feels better with it than without it in my new 'not ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had to use it, and hope never to, but feels better with it than without it in my new 'not too safe neighborhood' at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had to use it yet, thank god, but it’s discreet on my keychain, and I tested it out to find that it’s as loud as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This will definitely get attention for you if faced with any type crisis.
customer_reviews.author: KMc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully, I'll never need to use this but if I do it will be right there within reach.
customer_reviews.author: Kaj

customer_reviews.title: Randomly started ringing in the middle of night with key still in
customer_reviews.text: Bad product. Alarm started ringing randomly even with the key in. Started ringing in the middle of the night and we had to break it before it started waking up the neighborhood. Horrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit K.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, the sound is strong enough to make someone ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, the sound is strong enough to make someone to run from me. I have it with me all the time hanging outside of my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Good safety item.
customer_reviews.text: Very compact, loud noise and fits easily on purse strap.
customer_reviews.author: MI Miss

customer_reviews.title: Loud and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these. One for myself, one for my Grand daughter and one for my daughter in law. Very easy to use and loud!
customer_reviews.author: Susanne M Wilburniii

customer_reviews.title: He loves it~!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son that jogs and runs a lot in and around Baltimore, MD. He was glad to get it~!
customer_reviews.author: Shery Stahnke

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Very load. I was surprised on how load it was! Got it for my wife and glad I did.

customer_reviews.title: dropped it once in my leasing office and it spooked me so bad that I'm sure it'll work just fine if ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely loud, dropped it once in my leasing office and it spooked me so bad that I'm sure it'll work just fine if ever actually needed.

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got four of these for family and friend. Will be buying more here soon. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: I have this hooked on my keys. I live ...
customer_reviews.text: I have this hooked on my keys. I live in Chicago so it makes me feel safer when I'm walking around. Thankfully haven't had to use it yet, but have tested it and it's very loud.

customer_reviews.title: Was probably fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids managed to pull it while in the class. Was probably fun lol

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: It's so hard 2 open...you'll be attacked before u can activate the alarm..the instructions are horrible.... and what's the round button on the front for?

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very loud. I can believe this would work in dicey situations.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it me and my wife jogs and she gets really ahead of me sometimes, good tool

customer_reviews.title: I like that it comes where you can wear it around ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't think it is loud enough. I like that it comes where you can wear it around your neck.

customer_reviews.title: Love this little alarm
customer_reviews.text: Love this little alarm! It is compact and inconspicuous, but makes quite the commotion when activated. I feel safer whenever I have it with me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Mendez

customer_reviews.title: I got this last month for my daughter. She ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this last month for my daughter. She was using the carbine clip on her belt loop when she would ride her bike or be out with friends. Somewhere it came off the carbine and got lost. So the clip isn't very tight to secure it. Now needing to order another. The lanyard is too long for her. For these reasons I only gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Great product... Just like I believed it would be... Thanks... My daughter jogging is the user... Thanks

customer_reviews.title: The sound are loud. This is the thinnest one ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound are loud. This is the thinnest one you can find.

customer_reviews.title: This alarm is very loud
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is loud enough to scare anyone away.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: extremely loud. have not used it yet besides just testing it out.

customer_reviews.text: Struggle to remove pin. Do not reccomend. Will return for something easier to use.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on purse though
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t as loud as I thought it would be, and it’s hard for me to separate. Easy to put on purse though.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s supposed to, needs some kind of ...
customer_reviews.text: Does what it’s supposed to, needs some kind of attachment point at both ends. Should of looked closer before purchasing.

customer_reviews.title: Short alarm duration.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the way this feels and how small it is
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this feels and how small it is. I got curious to how loud it could be and pulled the top of.. all I can say is everyone in the room was startled. I definitely feel safe with this around.
customer_reviews.author: SC19

customer_reviews.title: I’m glad I didn’t trust it to help keep me safe ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work. My husband and I were curious about how loud it would be so we tested it when it arrived in the mail...pulled the tab and nothing happened. I’m glad I didn’t trust it to help keep me safe out on a long run...
customer_reviews.author: KLiska

product_meta.title: iMaxAlarm SOS Alert Personal Alarm - 130dB Alarm - Safety & Security Emergency Device - Matte Black
product_meta.description: Color:Matte BlackAt iMaxAlarm, we care about your safety. Our goal is to enable everyone with the ability to take safety and security into their own hands. We designed a sleek, yet simple and affordable solution that works for all ages. The iMaxAlarm SOS Alert is an easy to use personal security device. A simple pull from the top of the device will sound a loud, ear piercing 130 dB alarm to draw the attention of persons around you and indicate an emergency situation. Help prevent assaults and harassment, identify emergency situations, and notify others of your location or need for help. The SOS Alert device comes ready to use right out of the box and has a continuous run time of 30 minutes. The alarm can be easily turn off by re-inserting the top. It also includes a carabiner and lanyard for wearing around your neck or for attachment to your purse, keys, backpack, and more.
feature_bullets: Extremely loud 130 dB alarm/siren to immediately draw attention for any emergency situation
Safe and easy to use for adults and children – simply pull the top to activate alarm
Designed to be robust, compact, and lightweight, yet elegant and hip. Throw it in your pocket, purse, bag, or wear it around your neck
It’s the perfect companion for all activities, including walking, hiking, camping, field trips, running, night out and more
Includes a carabiner for easy attachment
